verses.verse: There's a land that is fairer than day, And by faith we can see it afar; For the Father waits over the way, To prepare us a dwelling place there.
We shall sing on that beautiful shore The melodious songs of the blest, And our spirits shall sorrow no more, Not a sigh for the blessings of rest.
To our bountiful Father above, We will offer a tribute of praise, For the glorious gift of His love, And the blessings that hallow our days.
